mapper.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT RN.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTCNT FROM(
mapper.select: /*selectMenuAuthView*/ SELECT a.MENU_AUTH_IDX, a.MENU_AUTH_TYPE, a.MENU_AUTH_NAME, a.MENU_AUTH_SITECODE, a.MENU_AUTH_ITEM_META, a.REGDT, a.UPDDT, a.REGMEMID, a.UPDMEMID, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_MANAGER_MENU_AUTH b WHERE b.MENU_AUTH_IDX = a.MENU_AUTH_IDX) MANAGER_COUNT FROM T_MENU_AUTH a WHERE ORDER BY a.REGDT DESC

/*selectMenuAuthList*/
SELECT a.MENU_AUTH_IDX, a.MENU_AUTH_TYPE, a.MENU_AUTH_NAME, a.MENU_AUTH_SITECODE, a.MENU_AUTH_ITEM_META, a.REGDT, a.UPDDT, a.REGMEMID, a.UPDMEMID, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_MANAGER_MENU_AUTH b WHERE b.MENU_AUTH_IDX = a.MENU_AUTH_IDX) MANAGER_COUNT FROM T_MENU_AUTH a WHERE AND a.MENU_AUTH_TYPE = '1' ORDER BY a.REGDT DESC
/*selectMenuAuthListTotCnt*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_MENU_AUTH a WHERE AND a.MENU_AUTH_TYPE = '1' ORDER BY a.REGDT DESC

/*selectMenuAuthListForIndividual*/ SELECT TO_CHAR(a.MENU_AUTH_IDX) MENU_AUTH_IDX, a.MENU_AUTH_NAME, a.MENU_AUTH_SITECODE, c.SITE_NAME MENU_AUTH_SITENAME, a.MENU_AUTH_ITEM_META, a.REGDT, a.UPDDT, a.REGMEMID, a.UPDMEMID FROM T_MENU_AUTH a LEFT JOIN T_MANAGER_MENU_AUTH b on a.menu_auth_idx = b.menu_auth_idx LEFT JOIN T_SITE c on a.menu_auth_sitecode = c.site_code WHERE a.DELYN = 'N' AND a.MENU_AUTH_TYPE = '1' AND b.MNG_ID = #{schMngId} ORDER BY a.REGDT DESC
